question.Title: Choose a specific row in single column
question.Body:
I'm having a problem with my code. I can't locate a specific row in a single column. I want to start the output on the second row of may dataframe.

for row in dataframe.itertuples():    print (row.last[1][0])

I'm having IndexError: string index out of range error which I don't understand. Thank you in advance for helping
